GSD.description:
media: rga: fix possible memory leak in rga_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit eeb4819e94aa69767b9e5591e70c63e8b7c5786a. For more details please see the references link.
